pkgmetadata.longdescription: Downloading, Reading and Analyzing PNDS Microdata - Package in Development // Provides tools for downloading, reading and analyzing the National Survey of Demographic and Health - PNDS, a household survey from Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics - IBGE. The data must be downloaded from the official website https://www.ibge.gov.br/. Further analysis must be made using package 'survey'.
